title: Mega Man III
content:
Mega Man 3 was released by Capcom in 1990. Dr Wily is up to no good once again, and, once again, Mega Man is called to take care of business.

New to this game are Mega Man's slide move and robo-dog extraordinaire, Rush. Proto Man shows up to save the day a few times.
boss_weaknessses:
Boss Weaknesses

Robot Masters

  • Top Man: Use Hard Knuckle or Mega-Buster
  • Shadow Man: Use Top Spin
  • Spark Man: Use Shadow Blade
  • Magnet Man: Use Spark Shock
  • Hard Man: Use Magnet Missile
  • Snake Man: Use Needle Cannon
  • Gemini Man: Use Search Snake
  • Needle Man: Use Gemini Laser

Mega Man 2 Robot Masters

  • Metal Man: Use Magnet Missile or Hard Knuckle
  • Quick Man: Use Gemini Laser or Search Snake
  • Air Man: Use Magnet Missile or Spark Shock
  • Crash Man: Use Hard Knuckle
  • Flash Man: Use Needle Cannon or Gemini Laser
  • Bubble Man: Use Spark Shock or Shadow Blade
  • Wood Man: Use Neelde Cannon or Search Snake
  • Heat Man: Use Top Spin
  • Break Man: Use Mega-Buster

Fortress Guardians

  • Kamegoro Maker: Use Shadow Blade or Search Snake
  • Yellow Devil MK-II: Use Hard Knuckle
  • Holo Mega Men: Use Top Spin or Search Snake
  • Wily Machine Phase 1: Use Hard Knuckle
  • Wily Machine Phase 2: Use Hard Knuckle
  • Gamma Phase 1: Use Hard Knuckle
  • Gamme Phase 2: Use Top Spin or Search Snake
